title: Adversity Defines You
itunes:title: Adversity Defines You
description:
Ep 133 - One thing is for sure, you will have more adversity before you die. So how do you deal with it? In this episode I talk about how to use adversity to your advantage and to treat your life like a movie and you are the star actor.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
